definition: ability/talent/sb of a certain type/a capable individual/only/only then/just now

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)
gifted scholar, beautiful lady (idiom)/pair of ideal lovers
beautiful lady, gifted scholar (idiom)/pair of ideal lovers
Four great southern talents of the Ming, namely: Tang Bohu 唐伯虎, Zhu Zhishan 祝枝山, Wen Zhengming 文徵明|文征明 and Xu Zhenqing 徐禎卿|徐祯卿
pinyin: Jiang1 nan2 si4 da4 cai2 zi3

sentences.english: The party tonight was crowded with wits and beauties.
sentences.chinese: 今晚的舞會才子佳人雲集。

sentences.english: The love-drama about talented scholars and beautiful girls is main form of the Yuan opera.
sentences.chinese: 才子佳人愛情戲是元雜劇愛情戲的主要形式。

sentences.english: These books are all about talented scholars and lovely ladies.
sentences.chinese: 這些書都是寫才子佳人的。

sentences.english: She is what you call a "blue-stocking".
sentences.chinese: 她就是你所謂的“女才子”。

sentences.english: Wuhan"is delighted for frain", the Shui Shang wedding, attract to come to genius and beauty absolutely myriad.
sentences.chinese: 武漢“喜谷”，水上婚禮，吸引來才子佳人萬萬千。
我想我暈車了，有一個才子叫許嵩。

sentences.english: Natural beauties collocation, only envy mandarin duck not envy immortal.
sentences.chinese: 天生才子佳人搭配，只羨鴛鴦不羨神仙。

sentences.english: Known as the Musician, Fang Datong efforts at making music himself.
sentences.chinese: 被譽爲音樂才子，方大同努力在音樂裏作他自己。

sentences.english: And talent as a friend to pass him, and he has failed the Wets .
sentences.chinese: 而才華不如他的朋友考取了，而他這位才子竟落榜。

sentences.english: For a man of literary talents, he may adopt a unique strategy that differentiates from that of ordinary people.
sentences.chinese: 才子的策略有時候也有異於常人。

sentences.english: He thinks of himself as a wit.
sentences.chinese: 他認爲自己是一個才子。

sentences.english: But the gifted Daniel scholar shouldn't be an armchair strategist.
sentences.chinese: 不過你這個牛才子也不能光說不練吧。

sentences.english: First with wit is divided into two unsuccessful preeminence.
sentences.chinese: 先把才子分爲出人頭地與懷才不遇兩種。

sentences.english: Who love the wind, the wind love wit, handsome, have a good reputation.
sentences.chinese: 才子鍾情佳人，佳人愛慕才子英俊又有美好名聲。

sentences.english: Who love the wind, the wind love wit, handsome, have a good reputation.
sentences.chinese: 才子鍾情佳人，佳人愛慕才子英俊又有美好名聲。

sentences.english: A woman like her is what people call a blue-stocking.
sentences.chinese: 像她這樣的女人就是人們所說的女才子。

definition: gifted scholar, beautiful lady (idiom)/pair of ideal lovers
famous scholar/worthy/celebrity, esp. distinguished literary person having no official post
distinguished and accomplished/outstanding/talented in letters and unconventional in lifestyle/romantic/dissolute/loose
an outstanding talent (idiom)/surpassing insight and acumen
